attributes.action: I want online trolling to be a criminal offense
attributes.background: In todays society we sometimes ignore online trolling and the reason for this is because people have grown ignorant, I feel that we need to fight this online abuse regarding, mental health issues and disabilities in children and adults alike, this is a growing concern which needs to be addressed.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

Sending people offensive or threatening messages online is already an offence. You can find out more about the prosecuting guidelines here:

https://www.cps.gov.uk/legal-guidance/social-media-guidelines-prosecuting-cases-involving-communications-sent-social-media

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
